jobs.title: Junior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
• At least 1-2 years of experience in Java

• Database modelling skills

• Microservice experience (Spring Boot)

• Build tools (Maven or Gradle)

• CI / CD experience (nice to have)

• Scrum workflow experience (nice to have)

• You are fluent in English or German

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
- 3+ experience in Java Development
- Good knowledge with Spring and Spring Boot
- Knowledge of other open source platforms like NodeJs is an advantage
- Understanding the concepts of relational and non-relational database engines

jobs.title: IT Hardware Support
jobs.description:
QUALIFICATIONS

BSc/BA in IT, Computer Science or relevant field
Minimum 3 years of work experience in a similar position 
Very Good knowledge of English language
Experience on SAP application support is considered a plus
Other experience on ERP applications’ support is considered a plus

jobs.title: Desktop Support Technician
jobs.description:
Requirements:

• Minimum 2 years of experience with helpdesk and application support
• Minimum 1 year of experience in a Financial firm or equivalent fast-paced environment
• Good problem solving. Excellent written, verbal communication and interpersonal skills

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer
Senior .NET Developer
jobs.description:
At least 5 years’ experience in .NET Framework
Demonstrable C# programming abilities
Strong knowledge in video streaming protocols
Experience with MSSQL database (Entity Framework)
Working with source control
Good self-learning skills
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
